Articles.Content:
> 
> [sarcasm]
> Yay! 1.0.3 is out, so I can redo that 5 hour burn! Fun!
> 
> [/sarcasm]

Does it break saves?

> 
> Does it break saves?

Don't know yet, luckily I just backed up my screenshots and saves.

> 
> Does it break saves?

Yes.

![45EWhDo.png](http://i.imgur.com/45EWhDo.png)

![Em95Mxw.png](http://i.imgur.com/Em95Mxw.png)

![8sU85LK.png](http://i.imgur.com/8sU85LK.png)

Also, what's going on with the phone numbers on the non-deployable radiators?

![cvrgld8.png](http://i.imgur.com/cvrgld8.png)

Wow, the new patch is glitchy for me. That's life with OSx, I guess..

Testing new tricks for the MTV.

I discovered a heating bug already. Also Editor Extensions is broken. OOH but those radiator panels are going to be great for building!! I am already modifying my SPR rover to use them. Maybe. I have it looking good already and I would only save four odd parts.
Yeah, the new update broke my latest crafts because of that heating bug ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). I hope squad releases a hotfix soon.

> 
> I discovered a heating bug already. Also Editor Extensions is broken. OOH but those radiator panels are going to be great for building!! I am already modifying my SPR rover to use them. Maybe. I have it looking good already and I would only save four odd parts.

You had the same thought I did ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Note to self: DO NOT update to 1.0.3

Also, the Altair is almost complete, but all my crafts are too big to fit inside an inline Ares V fairing.

EDIT: Mi spelllin iz flaules...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T03:46:43Z" title="06/23/2015 03:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Rolanvorxariat**

> 
> Note to self: DO NOT update to 1.0.3
> Also, the Altair is almost complete, but all my crafts are too big to git inside an inline Ares V fairing.

You can run, and you can hide, but if you ever want to release a craft pack, 1.0.3 will find you...

Also, nothing from my pack will fit inside an inline AV fairing, but then again, some sources show AV as not being constant width, anyway.

> 
> You can run, and you can hide, but if you ever want to release a craft pack, 1.0.3 will find you...
> Also, nothing from my pack will fit inside an inline AV fairing, but then again, some sources show AV as not being constant width, anyway.

What is an AV fairing?

> 
> What is an AV fairing?

I was using AV as short for Ares V, like SV, Saturn V. I haven't heard of it before, I just made it up. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I was using AV as short for Ares V, like SV, Saturn V. I haven't heard of it before, I just made it up. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ah ok. Dude I wouldn't worry about that sort of thing. It's not possible to make all these things to the correct scale.

Good afternoon chaps and chapettes,

 Time to rebuild those launch vehicles. SRBs are super useful now.

> 
> Time to rebuild those launch vehicles. SRBs are super useful now.

Y'know, my full size Ares I might work now. My SLS will be quite good too.

> 
> Y'know, my full size Ares I might work now. My SLS will be quite good too.

Yup! It totally fixed all my launchers. Orion was golden before it's way op now!
Ohmigod I just discovered the editor extensions mod. Is anyone else using it? IT'S GODDAMN AMAZING

> 
> Ohmigod I just discovered the editor extensions mod. Is anyone else using it? IT'S GODDAMN AMAZING

I'm happy you discovered it! I've been using it for a looong time. I think the patch broke it though..
This will make my MTV look so much better. Holy cow. I wish stock had symmetry up to 50 ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)
Okay, I'm terminating my DTV test flight, the lag makes it unusable.

> 
> Okay, I'm terminating my DTV test flight, the lag makes it unusable.

Sorry to hear that man. I feel your feels. The game just keeps getting slower..

> 
> Sorry to hear that man. I feel your feels. The game just keeps getting slower..

I had 500 parts with orion, how many parts is your DTV+Orion?

> 
> I had 500 parts with orion, how many parts is your DTV+Orion?

I haven't tested them together yet. Not that many I don't think. Let me check.

Ouch, 615. It's a thing of beauty though! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Come one Squad, fix it, fix it, fix it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T22:52:55Z" title="06/23/2015 10:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

Not sure, the MTV won't be finished for a few days. 

Question: I assume the large rectangular panels on the DTV are solar panels, but could they be radiators?

> 
> I haven't tested them together yet. Not that many I don't think. Let me check.
> Ouch, 615. It's a thing of beauty though! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Come one Squad, fix it, fix it, fix it.

Ouch, indeed!

> 
> Not sure, the MTV won't be finished for a few days. 
> Question: I assume the large rectangular panels on the DTV are solar panels, but could they be radiators?

I don't know, but I assume solar panels, and whichever they are, the solar panels look the most like them.

- - - Updated - - -

How are you making that smooth curve on the end of the DTV hab? Intakes use up too many parts.

> 
> How are you making that smooth curve on the end of the DTV hab? Intakes use up too many parts.

I'm still using intakes, it doesn't add that much. How are you doing it?
